TopicTitle: Hack Gravity the same as the Mun?

Articles.Content:
I'm trying to design a vehical for Mun operations. I found the gravity hack in the debug menu, but it turns the gravity down too far. Is there any way to set the spaceport gravity to the same as the Mun for testing purposes?

Edited June 10, 2014 by Kerba Fett
Sadly there is not in stock. However there is a mod that allows you to do exactly what you are asking (I just don't know the name of it)

Hyper Edit is popular. You can zap your craft onto the surface of the Mun and test it there.

I think Taki is right about a gravity mod that you can use on Kerbin. Unfortunately I don't recall the name of it either.
